name: Wall Invaders
description:
Wall Invaders is just a simple and frustrating game. You play as a blue ball surrounded by walls filled with triangles what you're trying to do is to touch the walls while invading the invaders (triangle)

  • Tap to jump
  • When you hit the top or bottom gravity changes
  • Feedback and donations are appreciated
  • Share with your friends!
  • Available as Desktop with Gamejolt leaderboards here
